overview: Join a grassroots collective of volunteers as they search Winnipegâ€™s Red River and its banks for clues to find out what happened to their missing family and friends. The documentary demonstrates the devastating experience of searching for a loved one who didn't come home with profundity and humanity.
tagline: A sister who went missing. A brother who disappeared. The devastating experience of searching for a loved one who didn't come home.
title: this river
